text: Renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei nimen de zhu [an la], shi ta cong yige ren [a dan] chuangzaole nimen, you cong nage ren [a dan] chuangzaole ta de qizi [ha wa], bing you ta lia [a dan he ha wa] fanyanliao xuduo nannu. Nimen dang jingwei an la——nimen chang jie ta de mingyi xianghu yaoqiu quanli de zhu,[nimen buyao duanjue] xueqin guanxi. An la que shi jianshi nimen de.
